ProductInfo.Features:
8 CH H.264 compression triplex real time industrial DVR. 8 channel video and 4 channel audio inputs
Real time display; USB 2.0 interface
Economic 8 channel DVR 1500GB Hard Drive
Image Sensor: 1/4" CCD; Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines; Lens: 6.0mm
Package including: 8 CH standalone DVR, 1500GB hard drive, USB mouse, user manual, software, power adapter,  8 CCTV color bullet cameras, one 12V DC 9 channel CCTV distribution power supply box, 8 pack 100ft video cable, bonus 8 small (3"x2") surveillance decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 Channel Security DVR CCTV Recording Network Digital Video Recorder Surveillance System with 8 Indoor/Outdoor Night Vision Infrared Security Cameras, 1500GB Hard Drive, Power Supply, Video Cable W64
